name: Path of the X
description:
Path of the X is a roguelike bullet hell shooter similar to Binding of Isaac, Nuclear Throne or every SHMUP ever created.

You are a space pirate with quest for revenge, just watch out for space police.

  • Around 200 items
  • 7 ships to play
  • ~ 1500 rooms to beat
  • 20+ bosses
  • 4 endings
  • milions of bullets

Controls:

  • Mouse - aim
  • LMB - shoot
  • RMB - bomb
  • W/S/A/D - move
  • SPACE - use item
  • Q - more info
  • E - interact
  • F - hide/show item tracker
  • ESC - pause
  • Y/U - music down/up
  • H/J - sounds down/up
